title: Projects
text:
Tools: R, Statcast, tidyverse, ggplot2

Built a composite pitcher metric that blends Location+, strikeout ability, contact quality, and run prevention.

Worked with pitch-level Statcast data and custom weights to compare pitchers across seasons.

Visualized changes in performance year-over-year and identified undervalued arms.

üìÑ Paper:
View pRating Metric Write-Up (PDF) A comprehensive analytical paper detailing the construction, validation, and application of the pRating metric for evaluating MLB pitchers.

title: Projects
section: üèà NFL GO Route Completion and WR Separation Dashboard
text:
üèà NFL GO Route Completion and WR Separation Dashboard
R Shiny App
This app analyzes NFL go-routes against man coverage by quantifying receiver separation and quarterback completed-over-expected (COE) to identify true deep-ball effectiveness.


üìÑ Paper:
View NFL Go-Routes Analysis (PDF) An in-depth analysis of quarterback deep-ball accuracy and wide-receiver separation on go-routes against man coverage using tracking-based metrics.
